View Javadoc
1   package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
2   
3   import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils;
4   import org.apache.http.annotation.Contract;
5   import org.apache.http.annotation.ThreadingBehavior;
6   import org.apache.http.client.cache.InputLimit;
7   import org.apache.http.client.cache.Resource;
8   import org.apache.http.client.cache.ResourceFactory;
9   
10  import java.io.IOException;
11  import java.io.InputStream;
12  import java.nio.file.Files;
13  import java.nio.file.Path;
14  import java.nio.file.Paths;
15  import java.util.UUID;
16  
17  import static java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING;
18  
19  /**
20   * Generates {@link Resource} instances whose body is stored in a temporary file.
21   */
22  @Contract(threading = ThreadingBehavior.IMMUTABLE)
23  public class FileIndexResourceFactory implements ResourceFactory {
24      private final Path cacheDir;
25  
26      public FileIndexResourceFactory(final Path cacheDir) {
27          super();
28          this.cacheDir = cacheDir;
29      }
30  
31      protected Path generateUniqueCachePath(final String uri) {
32          String resourcePart = !uri.isEmpty()
33                  ? uri.substring(uri.lastIndexOf('/') + 1)
34                  : uri;
35          resourcePart = resourcePart.isEmpty()
36                  ? resourcePart
37                  : resourcePart + "_";
38          // append a unique string based on timestamp
39          return Paths.get(resourcePart +
40                  DigestUtils.md5Hex(UUID.randomUUID().toString()));
41      }
42  
43      @Override
44      public Resource generate(
45              final String requestId,
46              final InputStream inStream,
47              final InputLimit limit) throws IOException {
48          if (!Files.exists(cacheDir)) {
49              Files.createDirectories(cacheDir);
50          }
51          final Path cachedFile = generateUniqueCachePath(requestId);
52          Files.copy(inStream, cacheDir.resolve(cachedFile), REPLACE_EXISTING);
53          return new FileIndexResource(cachedFile, cacheDir);
54      }
55  
56      @Override
57      public Resource copy(
58              final String requestId,
59              final Resource resource) throws IOException {
60          final Path dst = generateUniqueCachePath(requestId);
61  
62          if (resource instanceof FileIndexResource) {
63              Files.copy(cacheDir.resolve(((FileIndexResource) resource).getPath()), cacheDir.resolve(dst),
64                      REPLACE_EXISTING);
65          } else {
66              try (InputStream is = resource.getInputStream())
67              {
68                  Files.copy(is, cacheDir.resolve(dst), REPLACE_EXISTING);
69              }
70          }
71          return new FileIndexResource(dst, cacheDir);
72      }
73  
74  }
